resources.string: How many primitive data types exist in Java?
In Java, suppose we had a string variable called "animal" with the following value "panda". Using the String charAt() function only, what index do I use to return the third letter of animal?

Is Java considered OOP (Object Oriented Programming)?
Java is the official language in Android development.
Java can create classes called objects.
Java has the fastest compiling speed compared to C and Python.
It is good practice to keep your object\'s class variables public rather than using setters and getters.
Java is used as the server-side language for most back-end development projects, including those involving big data and Android development.
